analysis.key_quote: Reinstating Schedule F will set a dangerous precedent that allows the President to decide who receives services and who gets left behind, and that cannot happen if the administration truly believes in an agenda that benefits all in the United States.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the rule by arguing that it will lead to politicization of the civil service and undermine merit-based principles, emphasizing the need for a nonpartisan civil service that serves the interests of all Americans.
